content.raw:
I think this has broken the regular gazebo builds:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/223/console

~~~
The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 libignition-math3-dev : Depends: libignition-math3 (= 3.2.0-1~xenial) but it is not going to be installed
 libsdformat4-dev : Depends: libignition-math2-dev but it is not going to be installed
~~~
content.html:
I think this has broken the regular gazebo builds:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/223/console
The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 libignition-math3-dev : Depends: libignition-math3 (= 3.2.0-1~xenial) but it is not going to be installed
 libsdformat4-dev : Depends: libignition-math2-dev but it is not going to be installed
